polkamarkets.title: Polkamarkets App
polkamarkets.description: Design review and implementation of user interface to be integrated with MetaMask interface or other digital wallets services.

ufal.title: U.F.A.L. 60 Years
ufal.description: Design and implementation of a virtual exhibition that shows the evolution of the Federal University of Alagoas.

vitalk.title: Ways to create Design Tokens
vitalk.description: Right before Gympass US, LLC acquire Vitalk, becoming Wellz, I've written a step-by-step to extract design tokens from a live web service without documentation.

bepro.title: Bepro App
bepro.description: User interface implementation of task-based crypto marketplace, integrating it with digital wallets services, such as MetaMask.
